mc.oracleText:
If you have no land cards in hand, you may reveal your hand rather than pay Land Grant's mana cost.

Search your library for a Forest card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText:

mc.name: Ancestral Mask
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 for each other enchantment in play.
mc.printedText: Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 for each other enchantment in play.
mc.flavorText: The masks, like the ancient trees they're grown from, lend strength to the dryads.

mc.name: Tiger Claws
mc.oracleText:
Flash
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has trample.
mc.printedText:
You may play Tiger Claws any time you could play an instant.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has trample.

mc.name: Squall
mc.oracleText: Squall deals 2 damage to each creature with flying.
mc.printedText: Squall deals 2 damage to each creature with flying.
mc.flavorText: The air that holds them aloft can just as easily put them down.

mc.name: Tranquility
mc.oracleText: Destroy all enchantments.
mc.printedText: Destroy all enchantments.
mc.flavorText: Sisay had been restored to her place on the ship, the Legacy had been recovered, and the Weatherlight was sailing home to Dominaria. Gerrard focused on the debts he'd settled . . . and on those he'd soon collect.

mc.name: Desert Twister
mc.oracleText: Destroy target permanent.
mc.printedText: Destroy target permanent.
mc.flavorText: The magical dust clouds Mercadian mages use to traverse the plane generate storms that devastate the surrounding terrain. But as long as the storms don't touch the mountain, the nobles simply don't care.

mc.name: Ferocity
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature blocks or becomes blocked, you may put a +1/+1 counter on it.
mc.printedText: Whenever enchanted creature blocks or becomes blocked, you may put a +1/+1 counter on it.
mc.flavorText:
"You lot go on ahead. I'll keep killing them until it sticks."
--Tahngarth

mc.printedText: Return target green card from your graveyard to your hand.

mc.name: Ramosian Sky Marshal

Flying
{7}, {T}: Search your library for a Rebel permanent card with converted mana cost 6 or less and put that card into play. Then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText:
Flying
{7}, {T}: Search your library for a Rebel card with converted mana cost 6 or less and put that card into play. Then shuffle your library.

mc.printedText: Whenever Cho-Arrim Bruiser attacks, you may tap up to two target creatures.
mc.flavorText: He doesn't know why the Cho-Arrim fight the Mercadians, but he's happy to bash heads for them anyway.

mc.name: Reverent Mantra
mc.oracleText:
You may remove a white card in your hand from the game rather than pay Reverent Mantra's mana cost.

mc.printedText: Attacking doesn't cause Jhovall Queen to tap.

mc.printedText: {W}{W}: Put a 1/1 white Soldier creature token into play. Play this ability only if you control no creatures and only once each turn.

mc.oracleText: You have shroud. (You can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
mc.printedText: You can't be the target of spells or abilities.
mc.flavorText: "I did not choose my role, Orim," said Cho-Manno patiently, "and I suspect Gerrard did not choose his."

mc.name: Spiritual Focus
mc.oracleText: Whenever a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard a card, you gain 2 life and you may draw a card.
mc.printedText: Whenever a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard a card, you gain 2 life and you may draw a card.

mc.name: Wave of Reckoning
mc.oracleText: Each creature deals damage to itself equal to its power.
mc.printedText: Each creature deals to itself damage equal to its power.
mc.flavorText: Inner conflict can defeat a soldier more quickly than any army.

mc.name: Armistice
mc.oracleText: {3}{W}{W}: You draw a card and target opponent gains 3 life.
mc.printedText: {3}{W}{W}: You draw a card and target opponent gains 3 life.
mc.flavorText:
We all must profit for peace to last.
--Mercadian saying

mc.name: Cornered Market
mc.oracleText: Players can't play spells or nonbasic lands with the same name as a nontoken permanent.
mc.printedText: Players can't play spells or nonbasic lands with the same name as a card in play.
mc.flavorText:
Don't step on the livelihood of other vendors, or they may step on you.
--Mercadian saying

mc.name: Crackdown

mc.printedText: Nonwhite creatures with power 3 or greater don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.
mc.flavorText:
"There is no place for mercy in defense of our lives."
--Ta-Spon, Cho-Arrim executioner

mc.name: Common Cause
mc.oracleText: Nonartifact creatures get +2/+2 as long as they all share a color.
mc.printedText: Nonartifact creatures get +2/+2 as long as they all share a color.
mc.flavorText: Mercadia City's troops are at their best when they have no enemy to fight.

mc.oracleText: {3}{U}, {T}, Discard a card: Untap target creature and gain control of it until end of turn. That creature gains haste until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {3}{U}, {T}, Discard a card from your hand: Untap target creature and gain control of it until end of turn. That creature gains haste until end of turn. (It may attack and {T} the turn it comes under your control.)
mc.flavorText: "It's no challenge to master a Mercadian."

mc.name: Aerial Caravan

Flying

mc.printedText:
Flying
{1}{U}{U}: Remove the top card of your library from the game. Until end of turn, you may play that card as though it were in your hand. (Reveal the card as you remove it from the game.)
mc.flavorText: Successful delivery is not guaranteed.

mc.printedText: Whenever Saprazzan Heir becomes blocked, you may draw three cards.

Flying

Flying

{1}: Return target land you control to its owner's hand.

{1}: Return target land you control to its owner's hand.

mc.printedText: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by creatures you control.

mc.printedText: Until end of turn, all creatures gain "{T}: Tap target creature."

mc.printedText: Whenever a creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, return that creature to its owner's hand.

mc.printedText: Sorcery spells cost {3} more to play.

mc.printedText: When Strongarm Thug comes into play, you may return a Mercenary card from your graveyard to your hand.

Trample

mc.printedText: Look at target player's hand and choose up to two cards from it. That player discards those cards.

mc.printedText: {B}: Put target creature card from your graveyard on top of your library.

mc.printedText: Remove X target creature cards in your graveyard from the game. For each creature card removed this way, put a black 2/2 Zombie creature token into play.

mc.printedText: Set aside all permanents. You choose one of those cards and put it into play tapped under your control. mc.oracleText: Creatures you control have fear.
mc.printedText: Creatures you control can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and black creatures.
mc.flavorText: "If they move, kill them. In fact, kill one now to make sure the other understands."

mc.name: Putrefaction
mc.oracleText: Whenever a player plays a white spell or green spell, that player discards a card.
mc.printedText: Whenever a player plays a white spell or green spell, that player discards a card from his or her hand.
mc.flavorText:
"Do you want to be alive or whole?"
--Ta-Karnst, Cho-Arrim healer

mc.name: Seismic Mage
mc.oracleText: {2}{R}, {T}, Discard a card: Destroy target land.
mc.printedText: {2}{R}, {T}, Discard a card from your hand: Destroy target land.
mc.flavorText: The ground shakes when he walks. His customers shake if they're late with his fee.

mc.name: Kris Mage
mc.oracleText: {R}, {T}, Discard a card: Kris Mage deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText: {R}, {T}, Discard a card from your hand: Kris Mage deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
mc.flavorText: Her blade draws blood without ever touching its target.

mc.name: Warmonger
mc.oracleText: {2}: Warmonger deals 1 damage to each creature without flying and each player. Any player may play this ability.
mc.printedText: {2}: Warmonger deals 1 damage to each creature without flying and each player. Any player may play this ability.
mc.flavorText: Funny how money and war travel so well together.

mc.name: Hired Giant
mc.oracleText: When Hired Giant comes into play, each other player may search his or her library for a land card and put that card into play. Then each player who searched his or her library this way shuffles it.
mc.printedText: When Hired Giant comes into play, each other player may search his or her library for a land card, put that card into play, then shuffle that library.

mc.oracleText:
{1}: Flailing Ogre gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Any player may play this ability.
{1}: Flailing Ogre gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Any player may play this ability.
mc.printedText:
{1}: Flailing Ogre gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Any player may play this ability.
{1}: Flailing Ogre gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Any player may play this ability.

mc.oracleText: Mountainwalk (This creature is unblockable as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)
mc.printedText: Mountainwalk (This creature is unblockable as long as defending player controls a mountain.)
mc.flavorText: The Kyren goblins created most of the inverted mountain's tunnels simply by driving the beast before them.

Haste

mc.printedText:

mc.oracleText: Trample, haste
mc.printedText: Trample; haste (This creature may attack and {T} the turn it comes under your control.)
mc.flavorText: Had Gerrard realized he'd end up fighting against them, he might not have trained them so well.

mc.name: Ogre Taskmaster
mc.oracleText: Ogre Taskmaster can't block.
mc.printedText: Ogre Taskmaster can't block.
mc.flavorText: He doesn't have to be smart--his masters only ever give him one command.

Haste

mc.printedText:
Haste (This creature may attack and {T} the turn it comes under your control.)
Whenever Lava Runner becomes the target of a spell or ability, that spell or ability's controller sacrifices a land.

mc.name: Kyren Negotiations
mc.oracleText: Tap an untapped creature you control: Kyren Negotiations deals 1 damage to target player.
mc.printedText: Tap an untapped creature you control: Kyren Negotiations deals 1 damage to target player.
mc.flavorText: Kyren goblins always speak in questions and never allow wrong answers.

mc.name: Close Quarters
mc.oracleText: Whenever a creature you control becomes blocked, Close Quarters deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText: Whenever a creature you control becomes blocked, Close Quarters deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
mc.flavorText: The Mercadians' ineptitude in close combat sometimes accidentally pays off.

mc.name: Furious Assault
mc.oracleText: Whenever you play a creature spell, Furious Assault deals 1 damage to target player.
mc.printedText: Whenever you play a creature spell, Furious Assault deals 1 damage to target player.
mc.flavorText:
"Does it burn, Saprazzan? Do you wish you had never raised arms against us?"
--Kyren overseer

mc.name: Sustenance
mc.oracleText: {1}, Sacrifice a land: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {1}, Sacrifice a land: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: Like the dryads, the forest itself willingly gives up some of its life for the sake of the future.

mc.name: Mercadia's Downfall
mc.oracleText: Attacking creatures get +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of nonbasic lands defending player controls.
mc.printedText: Attacking creatures get +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of nonbasic lands defending player controls.
mc.flavorText: With an explosion that shook the foundation of the city, the Weatherlight burst from the underground hangar.

mc.name: Warpath
mc.oracleText: Warpath deals 3 damage to each blocking creature and each blocked creature.
mc.printedText: Warpath deals 3 damage to each blocking creature and each blocked creature.
mc.flavorText: Cho-Manno had never seen Mercadia City's forces fight so well. The magistrate must have hired a new hero.

mc.name: Word of Blasting
mc.oracleText: Destroy target Wall. It can't be regenerated. Word of Blasting deals damage equal to that Wall's converted mana cost to the Wall's controller.
mc.printedText: Destroy target Wall. It can't be regenerated. Word of Blasting deals damage equal to that Wall's converted mana cost to the Wall's controller.

mc.name: Volcanic Wind
mc.oracleText: Volcanic Wind deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures, where X is the number of creatures in play as you play Volcanic Wind.
mc.printedText: Volcanic Wind deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures, where X is the number of creatures in play.
mc.flavorText: The Cho-Arrim call it "the fury of Ramos."

mc.name: Magistrate's Veto
mc.oracleText: White creatures and blue creatures can't block.
mc.printedText: White creatures and blue creatures can't block.
mc.flavorText: The magistrate had been the goblins' puppet for so long that he made the right decisions with little prompting.

mc.name: Dawnstrider
mc.oracleText: {G}, {T}, Discard a card: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
mc.printedText: {G}, {T}, Discard a card from your hand: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
mc.flavorText: Morning's mists can hide many things.

mc.name: Squallmonger
mc.oracleText: {2}: Squallmonger deals 1 damage to each creature with flying and each player. Any player may play this ability.
mc.printedText: {2}: Squallmonger deals 1 damage to each creature with flying and each player. Any player may play this ability.
mc.flavorText: "Squall, gale, hurricane--it's all a matter of size . . . and price."

mc.name: Hunted Wumpus
mc.oracleText: When Hunted Wumpus comes into play, each other player may put a creature card from his or her hand into play.
mc.printedText: When Hunted Wumpus comes into play, each other player may put a creature card from his or her hand into play under his or her control.
mc.flavorText: Just one can feed a dozen people for a month.

mc.name: Boa Constrictor
mc.oracleText: {T}: Boa Constrictor gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {T}: Boa Constrictor gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: Its eyes are bigger than its stomach, but its mouth is larger still.

mc.name: Lumbering Satyr
mc.oracleText: All creatures have forestwalk.
mc.printedText: All creatures gain forestwalk. (They're unblockable as long as defending player controls a forest.)
mc.flavorText:
The satyr carves the path that all of Rushwood follows.
--Cho-Arrim saying

mc.name: Arms Dealer
mc.oracleText: {1}{R}, Sacrifice a Goblin: Arms Dealer deals 4 damage to target creature.
mc.printedText: {1}{R}, Sacrifice a Goblin: Arms Dealer deals 4 damage to target creature.
mc.flavorText: He has the weapons, he has the connections, and he knows the hangar's dark secret.

mc.name: Saber Ants
mc.oracleText: Whenever Saber Ants is dealt damage, you may put that many 1/1 green Insect creature tokens into play.
mc.printedText: Whenever Saber Ants is dealt damage, you may put that many 1/1 green Insect creature tokens into play.
mc.flavorText: They stay on the battlefield only long enough to consume the losers.

mc.name: Groundskeeper
mc.oracleText: {1}{G}: Return target basic land card from your graveyard to your hand.
mc.printedText: {1}{G}: Return target basic land card from your graveyard to your hand.
mc.flavorText: Whereas the rebels fight to defend the land, they work to renew it.

mc.name: Rushwood Legate
mc.oracleText: If an opponent controls an Island and you control a Forest, you may play Rushwood Legate without paying its mana cost.
mc.printedText: If an opponent controls an island and you control a forest, you may play Rushwood Legate without paying its mana cost.

mc.oracleText:
Flying

mc.printedText:
Flying
Whenever Caustic Wasps deals combat damage to a player, you may destroy target artifact that player controls.
mc.flavorText: Even the wasp knows how to pay the magistrate his due respect.

mc.name: Deepwood Tantiv
mc.oracleText: Whenever Deepwood Tantiv becomes blocked, you gain 2 life.
mc.printedText: Whenever Deepwood Tantiv becomes blocked, you gain 2 life.
mc.flavorText: A single tantiv is just as dangerous as a herd.

mc.name: Ley Line
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player may put a +1/+1 counter on target creature of his or her choice.
mc.printedText: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player may put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
mc.flavorText:
"I can feel the strength of the entire forest."

mc.printedText:

Trample

Trample
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Rushwood Elemental.

mc.printedText: Creatures you control get +0/+1 and may block as though they had flying.
mc.flavorText: It hardly weighs anything, but it takes all day to remove.

mc.printedText: Put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token into play for each card in your hand.

mc.printedText: Each player reveals the top five cards of his or her library, puts into play tapped all land cards revealed this way, and removes the rest from the game.

mc.printedText: All lands become 2/2 creatures until end of turn. They still count as lands.
mc.flavorText: As long as the dryads are a part of the forest, the forest is a part of the army.

mc.name: Snake Pit

mc.printedText: Whenever an opponent plays a blue or black spell, you may put a 1/1 green Snake creature token into play.
mc.flavorText:
If the ground is smooth, the way will be rough.
--Deepwood saying

mc.printedText: {1}, {T}, Discard a card from your hand: Target noncreature artifact becomes an artifact creature with power and toughness each equal to its converted mana cost until end of turn. (It retains its abilities.)

mc.printedText: {T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains flying, first strike, and trample until end of turn.

Enchant creature

mc.printedText: Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to a creature, you control that creature as long as Charisma remains in play.

mc.printedText: Creatures your opponents play come into play tapped.
mc.flavorText: Cho-Manno knew he had no choice but to ally with Gerrard. If that's what it took to free his people, he'd pay the price.

mc.printedText: Whenever a player plays a land, return Pangosaur to its owner's hand.

mc.printedText: At the end of your turn, if you didn't play a land this turn, you may draw a card.

mc.flavorText:
"As long as Rushwood glows, no life is ever truly lost."
--Ta-Karnst, Cho-Arrim healer

mc.name: Renounce
mc.oracleText: Sacrifice any number of permanents. You gain 2 life for each one sacrificed this way.
mc.printedText: Sacrifice any number of permanents. You gain 2 life for each one sacrificed this way.
mc.flavorText: Gerrard offered no defense to Orim's condemnation; the mission was under his command, and he was responsible.

mc.name: Tonic Peddler
mc.oracleText: {W}, {T}, Discard a card: Target player gains 3 life.
mc.printedText: {W}, {T}, Discard a card from your hand: Target player gains 3 life.
mc.flavorText: "The price is written at the bottom of the cup."
